books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: Eve Dallas and her partner, Peabody, investigate a grocer’s murder.
books.name: TREACHERY IN DEATH

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: A woman who survived a childhood abduction may have tricked the Massachusetts police sniper Bobby Dodge into killing her husband.
books.name: ALONE

books.author: by Sara Gruen
books.description: After his parents die in a car accident, young veterinary student — and an elephant — save a Depression-era circus.
books.name: WATER FOR ELEPHANTS

books.author: by Kim Harrison
books.description: The witch Rachel Morgan has three days to clear her name; Book 9 in the Hollows series.
books.name: PALE DEMON

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: A hacker and a journalist investigate the disappearance of a Swedish heiress 40 years earlier.
books.name: THE GIRL WITH THE DRAGON TATTOO

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: The New York detective Michael Bennett enlists the help of a former colleague to solve a rash of horrifying crimes that are throwing the city into chaos.
books.name: TICK TOCK

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: In the second volume of the Millennium trilogy, a Swedish hacker becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO PLAYED WITH FIRE

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: The third volume of the Millennium trilogy, about a Swedish hacker and a journalist.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO KICKED THE HORNET’S NEST

books.author: by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child
books.description: Gideon Crew avenges his father’s death and is sent on a mission by a government contractor.
books.name: GIDEON’S SWORD

books.author: by Deborah Harkness
books.description: The recovery of a lost ancient manuscript in a library at Oxford sets a fantastical underworld stirring.
books.name: A DISCOVERY OF WITCHES

books.author: by Jeaniene Frost
books.description: Cat Crawfield and her vampire husband, Bones, are forced to seek help from a dangerous “ally.”
books.name: THIS SIDE OF THE GRAVE

books.author: by Abraham Verghese
books.description: Twin brothers, conjoined at birth and then separated, grow up amid the political turmoil of Ethiopia.
books.name: CUTTING FOR STONE

books.author: by Linda Lael Miller
books.description: Steven Creed becomes the guardian of a 5-year-old boy, trading his law firm for a ranch near his McKettrick family in Stone Creek, Ariz.
books.name: A CREED IN STONE CREEK

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: Disillusioned and burned out as a chef, Kelly Matlock retreats to her sister’s house in Virgin River, where she meets a handsome widower and his rebellious stepdaughter.
books.name: HARVEST MOON

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP
